PscuLogFileTransformServiceSettings.description: Settings for PSCU Log File Transform Service

filters.description: JSON array of filter configurations. Format: [{"Name": "Transaction Post Date", "ValuesCausingInclusion": "", "ValuesCausingExclusion": "", "RequiresValue": true, "ErrorMessage": "Transaction Post Date is required"}]

inputFileFields.description: JSON array of input file field configurations. Format: [{"Name": "Savings Account Number", "DataType": "System.String", "EmptyAllowed": false}]

outputFileFields.description: JSON array of output file field configurations. Format: [{"Position": 0, "WhitespaceLength": 0, "Name": "Savings Account Number", "CustomFormatter": null, "TruncateToLength": 9, "TruncateFromPosition": "", "MinimumOutputLength": 9, "MinimumOutputPadFromPosition": "", "OutputFormatString": "", "StaticTextValue": ""}]

pathConfiguration.description: JSON object for path configurations. Format: {"InputPath": "input", "InputFilenamePattern": "\.csv$", "OutputPath": "output", "ErrorPath": "error", "ProcessedPath": "processed", "CompletedPath": "completed", "OutputFilePrefix": "tranlist.cc.", "InputFileExclusiveAccessTimeout": "00:05:00"}
